reviewText: easilly  understood if you are a Vietnam Veteran, possibly helpful to those wh0 never understood us and ptsd, a sad commentary on results of horrible battles.

An absolutely perfect representation of how the American Service Member was treated coming home from Vietnam and how we adjusted to the trauma and transition to society. From the bush to civilization, hard to comprehend. God bless all my brothers and sisters who were a part of one of the darkest times in American history. The shame of a lot of Americans for their treatment of brave Americans who fought to allow others express their freedoms.
